dsa5-aventuria-map.name: TDE5 Interactive Aventuria Map
dsa5-aventuria-map.importHint: Init the TDE5 Interactive Aventuria Map module. Imports the maps and all journals.
dsa5-aventuria-map.importContent:
Imports the TDE5 Interactive Aventuria Map module

Import the map and all journals for the TDE5 System.

The map contains the predefined journals for the entire Aventuria map. You can view the entries with the Journal Browser on the left toolbar ().

Portions of the texts on locations from the Wiki Aventurica Text (except for citations) are available under the 'Creative Commons' attribution-sharealike license -> Wiki Aventurica License Terms

{defaultText}
dsa5-aventuria-map.welcome:
Interactive Aventuria Map

In the Journal Directory you may find all relevant informations about the Here you can also initialize the Interactive Aventuria Map Modul.
dsa5-aventuria-map.mapMenuChoosePermission: Update rights for the selected folder and its subfolders for all players:
dsa5-aventuria-map.mapMenuInfoFinish: Rights updated successfully for all journals within the selected folder:
